languages.text: "Сестра Арджента, например..." {n}Голос Джай заметно теплеет.{/n} "Могла бы занять людей молитвой или историю им про святого какого рассказать в обмен на номерные талоны".

traits.locale_text: "Сестра Арджента, например..." {n}Голос Джай заметно теплеет.{/n} "Могла бы занять людей молитвой или историю им про святого какого рассказать в обмен на номерные талоны".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Sister Argenta, for instance..." {n}Jae's voice becomes noticeably warmer.{/n} "She could engage the people in a prayer or tell a story about some saint or other in exchange for their queue tickets."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta, for instance..." {n}Jae's voice becomes noticeably warmer.{/n} "She could engage the people in a prayer or tell a story about some saint or other in exchange for their queue tickets."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “可以让阿洁塔修女帮忙，比如说……”{n}婕伊的声音明显变得温柔起来。{/n}“她可以号召人们参与祈祷，或是讲述关于某个圣人之类的故事，以此换取那些请愿者的叫号票。”
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, for instance..." {n}Jae's voice becomes noticeably warmer.{/n} "She could engage the people in a prayer or tell a story about some saint or other in exchange for their queue tickets."

traits.locale_text: “可以让阿洁塔修女帮忙，比如说……”{n}婕伊的声音明显变得温柔起来。{/n}“她可以号召人们参与祈祷，或是讲述关于某个圣人之类的故事，以此换取那些请愿者的叫号票。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «La hermana Argenta, por ejemplo...». {n}La voz de Jae se vuelve considerablemente más amable.{/n} «Podría guiar a la gente en sus plegarias o contar la historia de algún santo a cambio de sus números».
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, for instance..." {n}Jae's voice becomes noticeably warmer.{/n} "She could engage the people in a prayer or tell a story about some saint or other in exchange for their queue tickets."

traits.locale_text: «La hermana Argenta, por ejemplo...». {n}La voz de Jae se vuelve considerablemente más amable.{/n} «Podría guiar a la gente en sus plegarias o contar la historia de algún santo a cambio de sus números».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シスター・アルジェンタがさ、例えばだけど…」{n}ジェイの声色が明らかに温かくなる。{/n}「ここの人らを祈祷に引き入れるとか、聖人の逸話を話すとか何かすれば、番号札を交換してもらえそうだなって思うのよね」
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, for instance..." {n}Jae's voice becomes noticeably warmer.{/n} "She could engage the people in a prayer or tell a story about some saint or other in exchange for their queue tickets."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター・アルジェンタがさ、例えばだけど…」{n}ジェイの声色が明らかに温かくなる。{/n}「ここの人らを祈祷に引き入れるとか、聖人の逸話を話すとか何かすれば、番号札を交換してもらえそうだなって思うのよね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Prenez sœur Argenta, par exemple, {n}commence Jae, dont la voix se réchauffe considérablement.{/n} Elle pourrait inviter les gens à prier, ou leur raconter l'histoire de quelque saint en échange de leur place dans la file d'attente. »
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, for instance..." {n}Jae's voice becomes noticeably warmer.{/n} "She could engage the people in a prayer or tell a story about some saint or other in exchange for their queue tickets."

traits.locale_text: « Prenez sœur Argenta, par exemple, {n}commence Jae, dont la voix se réchauffe considérablement.{/n} Elle pourrait inviter les gens à prier, ou leur raconter l'histoire de quelque saint en échange de leur place dans la file d'attente. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Schwester Argenta zum Beispiel ..." {n}Jaes Stimme wird hörbar wärmer.{/n} "Sie könnte die Leute zum Gebet bewegen oder eine Geschichte über Heilige erzählen, im Austausch für ihre Wartenummern."
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, for instance..." {n}Jae's voice becomes noticeably warmer.{/n} "She could engage the people in a prayer or tell a story about some saint or other in exchange for their queue tickets."

traits.locale_text: "Schwester Argenta zum Beispiel ..." {n}Jaes Stimme wird hörbar wärmer.{/n} "Sie könnte die Leute zum Gebet bewegen oder eine Geschichte über Heilige erzählen, im Austausch für ihre Wartenummern."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Misal Rahibe Argenta..." {n}Jae'ın sesi, fark edilir bir şekilde daha cana yakın çıkıyor.{/n} "Kuyruk fişleri karşılığında millete dua okutabilir veya azizlerden biriyle ilgili bir hikâye anlatabilir."
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, for instance..." {n}Jae's voice becomes noticeably warmer.{/n} "She could engage the people in a prayer or tell a story about some saint or other in exchange for their queue tickets."

traits.locale_text: "Misal Rahibe Argenta..." {n}Jae'ın sesi, fark edilir bir şekilde daha cana yakın çıkıyor.{/n} "Kuyruk fişleri karşılığında millete dua okutabilir veya azizlerden biriyle ilgili bir hikâye anlatabilir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
